com.ooyala.android.ui

Class OoyalaPlayerLayoutController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ooyala.android.ui.AbstractOoyalaPlayerLayoutController
      • com.ooyala.android.ui.OoyalaPlayerLayoutController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LayoutController, java.util.Observer

    public class OoyalaPlayerLayoutController
extends AbstractOoyalaPlayerLayoutController
    This LayoutController is a generic LayoutController that will work in most cases (regardless of the containing Layout type). It uses basic controls and allows additional overlays to be added. Fullscreening is done by opening a full screen Dialog and filling it with a dynamically created OoyalaPlayerLayout. Because of this, playback will be suspended and subsequently resumed during this process. As a result, fullscreening is slower than if the OoyalaPlayerLayout is embeded directly in the Activity's base layout, that base layout is a FrameLayout, and the LayoutController used is FastOoyalaPlayerLayoutController.
